name: Chess With Decks
description:
Basically a regular game of Chess with a deck of 'Corruption' cards which alter gameplay. Choose to draw a card OR play a piece each turn. Corruption 1 modifies how the pieces move, corruption 2 disables movement of the piece. Both corruptions last 3 turns.

Buggy as hell, slightly unfinished. No AI so you have to play both players. Instructions in the title screens. 

The UI doesn't scale correctly across all computers (??)

Music made on an extremely fucked up circuit bent SK-1. Enjoy!
